title: SOLD: T206 Piedmont 350 Christy Mathewson Dark Cap PSA 2

posts.post_title: SOLD: T206 Piedmont 350 Christy Mathewson Dark Cap PSA 2
posts.post_content:
Super nice eye appeal 2, freshly graded. No wrinkling or creases through the main body of the card. Grade is due to scuffing / light staining on the right border.

Asking $1,275 delivered, please DM for quickest response. Thanks!
